attributes.action: change driving age to 21 to 65 yr olds only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to change the legal driving age up to 21 to 65 yr olds only, far to many youngsters drive mopeds without a clue about road safety, plus many car drivers under 21 drive at speed witout due care & attention, this change would save lives, stop alot of dangerous driving & accidents plus help cut down congestion.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
